title: Fleur The Animation
synopsis: The life of a hentai mangaka is not easy. In the privacy of his bathroom, mangaka Obana tried his best to overcome his creative crisis by fantasizing about the editor of Shinonome. She is as beautiful as a lotus flower and as fragrant as jasmine, so she has long absorbed the guy's thoughts. Suddenly, out of nowhere, this woman appeared right in front of him at the most crucial moment and took on the result of his creative culmination. Having gotten the hang of things, she decided to help Obana.
